Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Considering its unique features and quality, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $15000. We are confident that this investment will not only satisfy your needs but also exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
